snippet: The Army has appointed a two-star general to conduct an investigation into the disappearance of Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl from his outpost in Afghanistan in 2009.
abstract: United States Army appoints Maj Gen Kenneth R Dahl to conduct an investigation into the disappearance of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl from his outpost in Afghanistan in 2009; Bergdahl, who was freed in exchange for Taliban detainees, is undergoing therapy and counseling at San Antonio Army hospital.
lead_paragraph: The Army has appointed a two-star general to conduct an investigation into the disappearance of Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl from his outpost in Afghanistan in 2009.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
